value.@value: ancient Buddhist paintings from the cave-temples of Tung-huang on the western frontier of China
Ancient Buddhist Paintings from the Cave-Temples of Tung-huang on the Western Frontier of China

description.@value: 敦煌莫高窟将来の仏画を収めた多色刷りの大型図録。スタインはこれらの仏画を第2次中央アジア探検（1906～08年）において収集した。L.Binyonによる論文「敦煌画および仏教絵画に占める位置」と、計48点の仏画に関するスタインの解説を含む。

A large color printed book of showing Buddhist paintings from the Mogao Caves in Dunhuang. Stein collected these paintings during his second expedition to Central Asia (1906-08).  Includes L.Binyon’s essay ‘Dunhuang paintings and their place amongst Buddhist art’, together with Stein’s descriptions of 48 Buddhist paintings.
